newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-ARSENAL AND CANNES TO SIGN PARTNERSHIP.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ARSENAL AND CANNES TO SIGN PARTNERSHIP.

text.p: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger said the London premier league team were considering a partnership with French first division side Cannes for the training of young players.
The former Monaco coach, on a private visit on the French Riviera, said on Monday Arsenal and Cannes were about to "sign a partnership in the field of training and talent spotting".
A number of promising players have emerged from Cannes' training center, like midfielder Patrick Vieira, now with Arsenal after a spell at AC Milan.
